channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: 5-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and father return to Minnesota from ICE facility in Texas
item.description: Five-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father have returned to Minnesota after being released by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

item.title: Mayor of Portland, Oregon, demands ICE leave the city after federal agents gas protesters
Man sentenced to 4 years in prison for throwing Molotov cocktail during LA immigration protest
